title: cpp_extension import raise an error in absence of importing torch
body_html:
Hi, I am following the tutorial about the cpp_extension feature.

However, after installing the extension, an undefined symbol: THPVariableClass error is raised when I try to import it into python. Adding import torch before importing the extension solves that.
body_text:
Hi, I am following the tutorial about the cpp_extension feature.
However, after installing the extension, an undefined symbol: THPVariableClass error is raised when I try to import it into python. Adding import torch before importing the extension solves that.
body:
Hi, I am following the tutorial about the cpp_extension feature.

However, after installing the extension, an ```undefined symbol: THPVariableClass``` error is raised when I try to import it into python. Adding ```import torch``` before importing the extension solves that.
